parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Map

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the map grid position of an object or position.<br>
The format is determined by the Grid format specified in the CfgWorlds for the current world. Eg: "024577" or "De82" or similar.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[mapGridPosition]] param

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> param: [[Object]] or [[Position]] - determines reference position

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - grid position

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_gridPos = [[mapGridPosition]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_gridPos = [[mapGridPosition]] [[getPos]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[BIS_fnc_gridToPos]], [[BIS_fnc_posToGrid]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
